    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19589643">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19589643">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19589643">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19589643">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19589643" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19589644">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19589644">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19589644">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19589644">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19589644" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19589645">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19589645">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19589645">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works (good for topic-generating and recommending sources)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19589645">
          <div id="boxatt19589645" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22910491">
              <a id="link_22910491" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22910491,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gothic &amp; Horror', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through library subscription. Contains several hundred academic-audience reference works.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22910492">
              Encyclopedia of Clothing and Fashion
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available in print copy in Trexler Library, call # 391.003 E56o, level B.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22910493">
              <a id="link_22910493" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;res_id=info%3Asid%2Fgale%3AGVRL&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi%2Ffmt:kev:mtx:journal&amp;rft.isbn=9781414498485&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:oclc.org:mul_coll" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22910493,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gothic &amp; Horror', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22910493}); ">
               Fashion, Costume, and Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Lengthy entries on fashion grouped by era (1960s, etc.).
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22919408">
              <a id="link_22919408" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.oxfordartonline.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22919408,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gothic &amp; Horror', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18640055}); ">
               Oxford Art Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An expanding range of Oxfordâ€™s acclaimed art reference works: Grove Art Online, the Benezit Dictionary of Artists, the Encyclopedia of Aesthetics, The Oxford Companion to Western Art, and The Concise Oxford Dictionary of Art Terms, as well as many specially commissioned articles and bibliographies available exclusively online.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22910494">
              <a id="link_22910494" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/4PBY" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22910494,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gothic &amp; Horror', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22910494}); ">
               St. James Encyclopedia of Popular Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Many entries on fashion, in the context of pop culture.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19589646">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19589646">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19589646">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly books and primary documents
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19589646">
          <div id="boxatt19589646" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22910597">
              <a id="link_22910597" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22910597,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gothic &amp; Horror', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22917911">
              <a id="link_22917911" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22917911,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gothic &amp; Horror', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Google Books is a rich source of full-text documents (books and other materials) published prior to 1923 that are now in the public domain.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19589649">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19589649">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19589649">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly journal articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19589649">
          <div id="boxatt19589649" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22910501">
              <a id="link_22910501" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22910501,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gothic &amp; Horror', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               A library subscription database. Good starting place for journals, and includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22910504">
              <a id="link_22910504" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22910504,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gothic &amp; Horror', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A library subscription database. Standard index for North American history. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22919410">
              <a id="link_22919410" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aft,air" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22919410,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gothic &amp; Horror', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12728981}); ">
               Art Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index and selected full text from art periodicals, 1929-present. Full text journals include Architects' Journal, Art Bulletin, and Art Journal.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22919668">
              <a id="link_22919668" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bth" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22919668,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gothic &amp; Horror', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730852}); ">
               Business Source Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Largely full text database of scholarly and trade journals covering all aspects of accounting, business, and economics. Full text journals include, among many others, the Harvard Business Review (1985-present, including all cases originally published in the Review), Academy of Management Journal, Accounting Review, and Journal of Marketing. Also includes several hundred in-depth reports on publicly traded companies. To access, click on the Company Profiles tab at the top of Business Source Complete.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24906992">
              <a id="link_24906992" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ufh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24906992,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gothic &amp; Horror', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12600190}); ">
               Communication and Mass Media Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier database of scholarly and trade journals and books in media and communication and related areas. Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22919399">
              <a id="link_22919399" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=f3h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22919399,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gothic &amp; Horror', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19008881}); ">
               Film and Television Literature Index with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals, trade journals, books, and more in the areas of television and film.  Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22919398">
              <a id="link_22919398" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22919398,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gothic &amp; Horror', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22910502">
              <a id="link_22910502" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22910502,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gothic &amp; Horror', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A library subscription database. Archive from Stanford University of scholarly journals in all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22919401">
              <a id="link_22919401" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22919401,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gothic &amp; Horror', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456735}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier scholarly index, with numerous links to full text, to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19600119">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19600119">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19600119">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search engines for primary sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19600119">
          <div id="boxatt19600119" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22919762">
              <a id="link_22919762" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22919762,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gothic &amp; Horror', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19978738}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Authoritativeness will vary. Assess author and institutional affiliation.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5254929" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19589651">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19589651">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19589651">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources and compiling an annotated bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19589651">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19589651" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19589653">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19589653">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19589653">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19589653">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19589653" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
